concurrent

Class SemaphoreGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • concurrent.SemaphoreGroup

  • public class SemaphoreGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a group of semaphores identified by distinct strings Supports basic acquire and release operations. Other operations could be added as necessary
    Author:
    MPatashnik

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SemaphoreGroup(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> permits, boolean fair)
      Creates a SemaphoreGroup.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acquire(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> permits)
      Attempts to acquire the given permits
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> drain()
      Attempts to acquire all permits available.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getAvailablePermits()
      Returns the permits (by identifier) this SemaphoreGroup still has available.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getIdentifyingStrings()
      Returns the set of valid identifying strings for this semaphore group
      java.util.Collection<java.lang.Thread> getQueuedThreads()
      Returns a collection containing threads that may be waiting to acquire
      int getQueueLength()
      Returns an estimate of the number of threads waiting to acquire this SemaphoreGroup
      boolean isFair()
      Returns iff this is fair
      void release(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> permits)
      Attempts to release the given amounts of the given permits.
      void releaseAll()
      Releases all permits this currently owns for all identifiers within this Semaphore Group
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the available permits out of the total as the toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SemaphoreGroup

        public SemaphoreGroup(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> permits,
                      boolean fair)
        Creates a SemaphoreGroup. All semaphores are initialized as unfair.
        Parameters:
        permits - - the Number of permits for each identifier string
        fair - - true iff this Semaphore is fair (wakes threads in the order they wait

    • Method Detail

      • acquire

        public void acquire(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> permits)
             throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Attempts to acquire the given permits
        Parameters:
        permits - - the permits to acquire
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - - see Semaphore.acquire()
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - If one of the permits this wants to acquire is an unrecognized string, or any of the permit acquisition counts is negative

      • drain

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> drain()
                                                        throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Attempts to acquire all permits available. Returns the acquired permits. May return an empty map if no permits were available.
        Returns:
        - The acquired permits. Will never be null, but may be empty.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - - see Semaphore.acquire

      • release

        public void release(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> permits)
             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Attempts to release the given amounts of the given permits. Won't release more permits for any identifier than this currently owns.
        Parameters:
        permits - - the permits to release.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - - see Semaphore.acquire

      • releaseAll

        public void releaseAll()
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Releases all permits this currently owns for all identifiers within this Semaphore Group
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - - see Semaphore.acquire

      • getAvailablePermits

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getAvailablePermits()
        Returns the permits (by identifier) this SemaphoreGroup still has available.

      • getIdentifyingStrings

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getIdentifyingStrings()
        Returns the set of valid identifying strings for this semaphore group

      • getQueuedThreads

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Thread> getQueuedThreads()
        Returns a collection containing threads that may be waiting to acquire

      • getQueueLength

        public int getQueueLength()
        Returns an estimate of the number of threads waiting to acquire this SemaphoreGroup

      • isFair

        public boolean isFair()
        Returns iff this is fair

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the available permits out of the total as the toString

        toString in class java.lang.Object
